means: 用事实支持（某主张、说法等），证实

sentence.Network_en: Do you have any proof to substantiate your alibi?
sentence.Network_cn: 你有证据表明你当时不在犯罪现场 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: There is little scientific evidence to substantiate the claims.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些主张几乎找不到科学依据来证实。

sentence.Network_en: Field experience did not usually substantiate the claims.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际经验通常都不能使这些看法具体化.

disclaimer放弃, 拒绝substantiate使具体化证实3

法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 继受法 adopted law 实体法 substantial law 程序法 procedural law.
“实质等同”（substantial equivalence）是将GMO与非GMO进行比较，如果没有发现二者有显著差别，就认为该GMO是安全的。不科 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin substantiat- 'given substance', from the verb substantiare

entry.def: To substantiate a statement or a story means to supply evidence which proves that it is true.

example.ex: There is little scientific evidence to substantiate the claims.
example.tran: 这些主张几乎找不到科学依据来证实。

means.word_mean: 1. establish or strengthen as with new evidence or facts;

sentences.sentence: "He embodies all that is evil wrong with the system"
"The painting substantiates the feelings of the artist"

means.word_mean: 3. make real or concrete; give reality or substance to;

sentences.sentence: "our ideas must be substantiated into actions"
"The president's trip will substantiate good relations with the former enemy country"

auth_sentence.content: Why is it you never ever substantiate your position?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why is it you never ever substantiate your position?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why is it you never ever substantiate your position?

auth_sentence.content: The...Government found itself unable to substantiate its accusations.
auth_sentence.res_content: The...Government found itself unable to substantiate its accusations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The...Government found itself unable to substantiate its accusations.

auth_sentence.content: Writings...quoted at great length to substantiate his point of view.
auth_sentence.res_content: Writings...quoted at great length to substantiate his point of view.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Writings...quoted at great length to substantiate his point of view.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部,始终+stant站,立→始终站着→固定的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 远的;遥远的;疏远的;不亲近的
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+stant站,立→分开站着→有距离的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立即的;紧迫的;[食品]速溶的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in内+stant站,立→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→紧迫的
instant紧迫的+aneous……的→马上发生的→同时发生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实质的;相当的;显著的;坚固的;富裕的
stems_affixes.word_buile: substant=substance物质;实质+ial……的→实质的,显著的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 独立存在的,直接的,实质的
stems_affixes.word_buile: substant=substance物质;实质+ive……的→adj.独立存在的,直接的,实质的
con全部,始终+stant站,立→始终站着→固定的
in内+stant站,立→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→紧迫的
substant=substance物质;实质+iate表动词→把[理论]物质化→证实

means.word_mean: 用事实支持(某主张、说法等);证明, 证实

sentences.en: Do you have any proof to substantiate your alibi?
sentences.cn: 你有证据表明你当时不在犯罪现场吗?
